name: eslint-config-eventbrite-legacy
description: Eventbrites's legacy ESLint config that lints ES5- and adheres to the Eventbrite JavaScript Coding Style Guide

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --message 'Patch release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --message 'Minor release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --message 'Major release v%s' && npm publish

author: Eventbrite <npmjs@eventbrite.com>
